name: Leeks Vinaigrette
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons white wine vinegar (or a fruit vinegar if available)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash leeks by soaking them in cold water and peeling off tough outer leaves. Trim bottoms and tops, leaving 8 inches of leeks. Steam 20 minutes. Run cold water over them for a minute to bring down temperature.
Drain leeks. Arrange on platter and pour vinaigrette over them. Chill 1 hour.
